title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified. This issue leads to the label's height not being adjusted accordingly.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label.

OB: The label's height remains the same even after the font size is modified.
EB: The label's height should automatically adjust to accommodate the new font size, ensuring proper alignment and visibility.
SR: 
- Change the font size of a label.
- Observe that the label's height does not change to match the new font size.
